name: Alarak
title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Discord Strike
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Vector Targeting Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 62 damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 health for each Hero hit.

heroics.name: Counter-Strike
heroics.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

heroics.name: Deadly Charge
heroics.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

original.name: Alarak
original.title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
original.description: Not all heroes are born of altruism... some, like Alarak, simply desire vengeance. As the new Highlord of the Tal'darim, Alarak leads his people to a destiny free of the corrupt influence of the fallen xel'naga, Amon.
original.shortDescription: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

baseHeroInfo.name: Alarak
baseHeroInfo.title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
baseHeroInfo.description: Not all heroes are born of altruism... some, like Alarak, simply desire vengeance. As the new Highlord of the Tal'darim, Alarak leads his people to a destiny free of the corrupt influence of the fallen xel'naga, Amon.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A combo Assassin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Sadism
trait.description: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes. Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

skins.name: Highlord of the Tal'darim
skins.description: Not all heroes are born of altruism... some, like Alarak, simply desire vengeance. As the new Highlord of the Tal'darim, Alarak leads his people to a destiny free of the corrupt influence of the fallen xel'naga, Amon.

skins.name: Highlord Alarak
skins.description: The Highlord's armor serves as both ceremonial adornment and as a conduit of raw power. Adorned with blood shards and fueled by terrazine, it channels Alarak's fury directly into his blades.

skins.name: Herald of N'Zoth Alarak
skins.description: The God of the Deep writhes within his prison, thrashing endlessly. Alarak, the Corruptor's Herald, brings word of the Old God's return, preparing all realities for the coming change.
